2.Pros: I enjoyed my time working for McDonald's as a kid. It helped me adapt and learn to work under someone. I believe the collection of individuals are of a different up bringings making for an experience.
2.Cons: The turn over rate was rather high. People would tend to do just enough to get by. It was remotely concerning for the time being.

3.Pros: Depending on the owner operator they can be a great company to work for , but not with a racist manager like I had in Picayune Ms.
3.Cons: Have to work long shifts sometimes without a break because they are always short handed.

5.Pros: it Was not hard to do it, paid okay and the hours were flexible to your schedule, whether you were busy or not
5.Cons: there were some days that were busy and it took a lot of time to get things done with no help

6.Pros: Great customers and employees. Fun work environment. New faces
